pages.text: The life essence of a suitable entity can be extract from it using $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$(), although not in regular manner. Instead, you must sneak-right-click the entity.$(br2)Resulting essences can be used in $(l:rituals/ritual_summon_creatures)the Summon Creatures ritual$() in place of offerings, and may be reused several times.
